text: Privacy Policy
This policy is only applicable to the "Delu" product of Beijing Dajie Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Deman Technology").
Operator: Beijing Dega Technology Co., Ltd.
Recent Updated Date: [2020] Year [12] month [14].
This policy will help you understand the following:
1. How do we collect and use your personal information
2. How do we use cookies and similar technologies
3. How can we share, transfer, and publicly disclose your personal information
4. How do we protect your personal information
5. Your rights
6. How do we deal with children's personal information
7. How can your personal information be transferred globally
8. How to update this policy
9. Application of this policy
10. How to contact us
Tech technology knows the importance of personal information to you, and will do its best to protect your personal information security and reliable.

We are committed to maintaining your trust in us, abiding by the following principles, and protecting your personal information: the principles of consistency and responsibility, the principles of clear purpose, the principles of consent, the principle of minimum necessary necessary, the principles of safety, the principles of subject participation, and the principle of openness and transparency.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We adhere to the following principles to protect your personal information: the principles of consistent power and responsibility, the principles of clear purpose, the principle of consent, the principle of minimum necessary necessary, the principles of safety, the principles of subject participation, and the principle of openness and transparency.

text: At the same time, the science and technology commitment of Daomao promised that we will take corresponding security protection measures to protect your personal information in accordance with the mature safety standards of the industry.
Please read and understand this "Privacy Policy" before using our products.
1. How do we collect and use your personal information

Personal information refers to a variety of information that can identify specific natural persons or reflects the activity of specific natural persons in a single or other information with other information.
In the following goals described in this policy, Gengoma Technology will collect and use your personal information when providing reading services for you:
1. Business function one: Registration becomes a user
In order to complete the creation account, you need to provide the following information: your mobile phone number.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In order to complete the creation account, you need to provide the following information: your mobile phone number.

text: You can also log in to get a third -party account (such as WeChat, QQ).
You will not affect your search and browsing functions during your login, but it may affect your additional business functions such as purchasing members and publishing comments.
The above information you provide will continue to authorize us to use it during your service.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: The above information you provide will continue to authorize us to use it during your service.

text: When you cancel your account, we will stop using and delete the above information.
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: When you cancel your account, we will stop using and delete the above information.

text: 2. Business function two: user portrait, personalized recommendation
When you use our service, this software will record your inter -operation logs, including searching keywords, accumulated use time, read books and chapters, bookshelves.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you use our service, this software will record your inter -operation logs, including searching keywords, accumulated use time, read books and chapters, bookshelves.

text: In order to better customize exclusive recommendations for you, you can also choose to fill in reading preferences according to your own needs.

We will extract your preferences based on the aforementioned information and your data, and based on the preference characteristic output indirect user portrait, so that you can provide you with customized services that are more suitable for you, to show you or recommend a higher degree of search results.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We will extract your preferences based on the aforementioned information and your data, and based on the output of indirect user portraits of preferences.

text: If you do not agree to provide the aforementioned information, or are not interested in the personalized content we recommend, you can use our product and/or service related feature settings to open/close recommendation when you want to close personalized recommendations.
label: Edit/Control
Usage
Important
rewrite: If you do not agree to provide the aforementioned information, or are not interested in the personalized content we recommend, you can use our product and/or service related feature settings to open/close recommendation when you want to close personalized recommendations.

text: The personalized recommendation setting path in the app is: "My - Settings -Reading Settings -Personalized Recommendation".
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: The personalized recommendation setting path in the app is: "My - Settings -Reading Settings -Personalized Recommendation".

You can store records and consumption records generated by the members when ordering members, and this information will be stored in our servers.

Important

First Party Collection Information

text: 2. How do we use cookies and similar technologies
To ensure normal operation, we will store small data files named Cookie on your mobile devices.
Cookie usually contains identifiers, site names, and some numbers and characters.

With the help of Cookie, we will record your login information and the operating information in the APP, so that we can store your preferences and use habits, help you save the steps to repeatedly enter the registration information, and help judge your account security status.I think you provide a easier user experience and service.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

label: Important

text: You can manage or stop cookies according to your preferences.
label: Important

text: 3. How can we entrust your personal information to deal with, share, transfer, and publicly disclose your personal information
(1) Entrusted processing
Some specific modules or functions in this business function are provided by external suppliers.
For example, we will hire service providers to assist us with customer support.

For companies, organizations, and individuals who commission our personal information, we will sign a strict confidentiality agreement with them, asking them to handle personal information in accordance with our requirements, this privacy policy, and any other related confidentiality and security measures.

text: The major changes in this policy include, but not limited to:
1. Make a major change in our service model.

2. We have changed significantly in the aspects of ownership structure and organizational structure.
